attributes.action: make earnings far in excess of benefits to encourage people to work and not to sit at home living off the state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am fed up with working and just being able to pay my bills and rent, with next to nothing left to make my life better. when you can look round and see people doing no work, with their lives all paid for them by hard working ordinary people who deserve better.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
